instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the Malay language, and your task is to convert it into the English language.
input: Undian pendapat diadakan sebelum pilihan raya ditutup menunjukkan Obama menang.
output: Opinion polls held before the polls closed showed Obama winning.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the Malay language, and your task is to convert it into the English language.
input: Menurut Boston Globe dan video yang dipaparkan di laman webnya, pengulas itu kemudian menunjukkan bahawa "Obama menjanjikan cukai yang lebih tinggi, lebih banyak perbelanjaan kerajaan."
output: According to the Boston Globe and video displayed on its website, the narrator then points out that "the real Obama promises higher taxes, more government spending."

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the Malay language, and your task is to convert it into the English language.
input: Apabila ditanya bila mereka percaya bahawa individu perlu diberi hak-hak asasi manusia, Obama menjawab bahawa soalan itu adalah "di atas gred gaji [beliau]" manakala McCain dengan tegas menjawab bahawa beliau percaya ia akan berlaku "pada saat persenyawaan."
output: When asked when they believed individuals should be given human rights, Obama responded that the question was "above [his] pay grade" while McCain decisively replied that he believed it should occur "at the moment of conception."

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the Malay language, and your task is to convert it into the English language.
input: Major juga berkata nasionalis Scotland terbabit dalam sentimen anti-Inggeris.
output: Major also said that Scottish nationalists engaged in anti-English sentiment.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the Malay language, and your task is to convert it into the English language.
input: Walaupun banyak negara-negara Eropah mengeluarkan dadah, yang terutamanya digunakan di Eropah sebagai Anaesthetic, tiada pengeluar yang didapati sanggup untuk membekalkannya untuk digunakan dengan hukuman mati, pemansuhan yang telah dilobi oleh Kesatuan Eropah sejak tahun 2008.
output: Although many European countries manufacture the drug, which is primarily used in Europe as an anæsthetic, no manufacturer has been found that is willing to supply it for use in conjunction with the death penalty, the abolition of which has been lobbied by the EU since 2008.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the Malay language, and your task is to convert it into the English language.
input: Joe Stewart adalah Pengurus Unit di Unit Pematuhan Anti-Spam baru dalam Jabatan Hal Ehwal Dalaman dan David Farrar adalah Pengerusi Jawatankuasa Dasar InternetNZ Awam, yang juga mempunyai input penting ke dalam bil akhir.
output: Joe Stewart is the Unit Manager of the Department of Internal Affairs new Anti-Spam Compliance Unit, and David Farrar is Chair of InternetNZ’s Public Policy Committee, who also had significant input into the final bill.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the Malay language, and your task is to convert it into the English language.
input: 27 May, 2005 Gunung Qomolangma, terkenal di barat sebagai Gunung Everest, mungkin lebih tinggi berbanding sebelum ini, dan sekumpulan 24 orang pengkaji China telah mengukur puncak dan membuat pemerhatian mengharapkan mereka dapat membuat dokumen mengenai ketinggian puncak itu sekarang.
output: May 27, 2005 Mount Qomolangma, known in the west as Mount Everest, may be taller than ever, and a group of 24 Chinese researchers have scaled the peak and made observations they hope will document its current height.
